title: Teams That Are a Pick Away, Plus the Stefon Diggs Extension
description:
Kevin, Nora, and Steven react to the news of the Eagles-Saints trade, Tua stans, and Stefon Diggs’s extension with the Bills. They follow up by discussing teams that can turn into a contender through the draft.

Host: Kevin Clark, Nora Princiotti, and Steven Ruiz
Associate Producer: Stefan Anderson
Additional Production Supervision: Arjuna Ramgopal

Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
